title: Bloody Mary prawn cocktail
ingredients: ['900g cooked medium prawns, shelled and deveined', '1L tomato juice cocktail, such as Britvic', '1 green chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '130g finely chopped white radish', '4 limes, juiced', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 avocado, peeled and chopped, or more to taste']
